languages.text: "Напрасно". {n}В руке Фроше возникает клинок — обычный штык-нож кадианского паттерна с монозаточкой и рукоятью, покрытой царапинами от долгого использования.{/n}
"That was a mistake." {n}A blade appears in Froscher's hand: a common Cadian-pattern, monomolecular-edged bayonet knife whose handle is covered in scratches from years of use.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Напрасно". {n}В руке Фроше возникает клинок — обычный штык-нож кадианского паттерна с монозаточкой и рукоятью, покрытой царапинами от долгого использования.{/n}

languages.text: “这不是个明智的决定。”{n}弗罗舍手中出现了一把利刃，那是一把普通的卡迪亚单分子刺刀，刀柄上布满了多年战斗留下的划痕。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was a mistake." {n}A blade appears in Froscher's hand: a common Cadian-pattern, monomolecular-edged bayonet knife whose handle is covered in scratches from years of use.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这是个不明智的决定。”{n}弗罗舍手中出现了一把利刃，那是一把普通的卡迪亚单分子刺刀，刀柄上布满了多年战斗留下的划痕。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: 「あれは間違いでした」{n}フロッシャーの手の中に刃が現れる。一般的なケイディアン式単分子刃の銃剣で、長年の使用から取っ手が傷だらけのものだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was a mistake." {n}A blade appears in Froscher's hand: a common Cadian-pattern, monomolecular-edged bayonet knife whose handle is covered in scratches from years of use.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あれは間違いでした」{n}フロッシャーの手の中に刃が現れる。一般的なケイディアン式単分子刃の銃剣で、長年の使用から取っ手が傷だらけのものだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: «Eso fue un error». {n}Algo aparece en la mano de Froscher: un cuchillo bayoneta de filo monomolecular con adornos cadianos cuyo mango está cubierto de arañazos por tantos años de uso.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was a mistake." {n}A blade appears in Froscher's hand: a common Cadian-pattern, monomolecular-edged bayonet knife whose handle is covered in scratches from years of use.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Eso fue un error». {n}Algo aparece en la mano de Froscher: un cuchillo bayoneta de filo monomolecular con adornos cadianos cuyo mango está cubierto de arañazos por tantos años de uso.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: "Das war ein Fehler." {n}Eine Klinge erscheint in Froschers Hand: ein gewöhnliches cadianisches Bajonettmesser mit Monomolekular-Klinge, dessen Griff durch jahrelange Verwendung zerkratzt ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was a mistake." {n}A blade appears in Froscher's hand: a common Cadian-pattern, monomolecular-edged bayonet knife whose handle is covered in scratches from years of use.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das war ein Fehler." {n}Eine Klinge erscheint in Froschers Hand: ein gewöhnliches cadianisches Bajonettmesser, einseitig geschliffen, dessen Griff durch jahrelange Verwendung zerkratzt ist.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: « Vous avez commis une grave erreur. » {n}Dans la main de Froscher apparaît un couteau baïonnette à la lame monomoléculaire décorée de motifs cadiens. Les traces d'usure sur sa poignée semblent indiquer qu'il s'en est servi plus d'une fois au fil des années.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was a mistake." {n}A blade appears in Froscher's hand: a common Cadian-pattern, monomolecular-edged bayonet knife whose handle is covered in scratches from years of use.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez commis une grave erreur. » {n}Dans la main de Froscher apparaît un couteau baïonnette à la lame décorée de motifs cadiens. Les traces d'usure sur sa poignée semblent indiquer qu'il s'en est servi plus d'une fois au fil des années.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: "Büyük hata ettiniz." {n}Froscher'ın elinde bir bıçak beliriyor. Cadia modeli, monomoleküler kenarlı bir süngü bu. Sapında bulunan sayısız çizikten yıllarca kullanıldığı anlaşılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was a mistake." {n}A blade appears in Froscher's hand: a common Cadian-pattern, monomolecular-edged bayonet knife whose handle is covered in scratches from years of use.{/n}
